amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding funding for the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for subsonic and hypersonic aeronautics research.

vote.text: Amendment SA 198 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 198 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2930) To express the sense of the Senate regarding funding for the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for subsonic and hypersonic aeronautics research.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 198 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 198 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Allen.
